sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" const BookFilters = ({onFilter}) =>{ const [titleText, setTitleText] = useState("") const [authorText, setAuthorText] = useState("") const [GenreText, setGenreText] = useState("") const [filterTitle, setFilterTitle] = useState(false) const [filterAuthor, setFilterAuthor] = useState(false) const [filterGenre, setFilterGenre] = useState(false) const [filterAvailable, setFilterAvailable] = useState(false) const [filterAll, setFilterAll] = useState(false) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(!titleText){ alert("please add a task") return } onFilter({titleText, authorText, filterTitle}) setTitleText("") setAuthorText("") setGenreText("") setFilterTitle(false) setFilterAuthor(false) setFilterGenre(false) setFilterAvailable(false) setFilterAll(false) } return(
setFilterTitle(e.currentTarget.checked)}> setTitleText(e.target.value)}>
setFilterAuthor(e.currentTarget.checked)}> setAuthorText(e.target.value)}>
setFilterGenre(e.currentTarget.checked)}> setGenreText(e.target.value)}>
setFilterAvailable(e.currentTarget.checked)}>
setFilterAll(e.currentTarget.checked)}>
) } export default BookFilters
